about_the_game:
Get ready to work at your corporate job as an Art Generator. Incoming work orders range from heartwarming birthday cards to ominous threats. The convenient projector-printer makes it easy to find all the images you're looking for and print out as many copies as you need. Time flies when you’re making collages! After work, talk to your coworkers at the virtual water cooler during your designated break time! Your manager seems quite nice but… What’s with all the rules against personal details? Working here, you feel like a number. Just a number…

Create Collages!

Use the projector-printer and a variety of reels to print out pictures to use in your collage. Move, rotate, scale, and flip the artwork to put together your perfect composition! Then it's ready for your eager customer to use!

Answer Commisions.

Every collage made in “Scrapped” is made using artwork in the public domain. That means YOU can use any collage you create however you’d like! 

Uncover company mysteries...

After every work day, head to the virtual water cooler to discover a gripping story about three souls unable to put their personality aside in a corporate dystopian world that discourages individuality. Despite the looming threat of unemployment, these humans can’t help but be, well, human. 

A Collage of Commentary

Scrapped blends thoughtful commentary about the ethical concerns regarding AI and capitalism. Corporations threaten to deindividualize people meanwhile AI threatens the same towards art. The looming threat of commodification is peppered throughout the narrative advanced and complemented by the mechanic of collage making.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur 11.0+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Scrapped

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support, ARM64
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 or Vulkan capable GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Gestalt Industries, Ltd. is looking for a qualified candidate for the Art Generator role. Complete your work orders by creating collages using an array of snippets: from photographs to posters to Victorian etchings. Hang out by the virtual water cooler for fun, company sanctioned small talk!
